评论概述: Nice dress, feels like a curtain
评论详情: Its overall good quality, but the texture leaves something to be desired. Its also super flat. It comes with a waist tie but its super silly when you consider the back closing structure. I do recommend overall. Fairly true to size.

It's fine but not great,  kind of costumey. The lace up back is a good idea but not enough.  I am 5'6, 165 lbs, 42-31-42, 34G, and usually fit well into retro/pinup or body con and especially halter tops. This is not a halter, the waist is far too loose to provide any underboob support or replace a bra strap.  The back when laced all the way shut comes close but really there's not much waist bust differential. Even if you have the kind of boobs that can usually go brakes in a halter dress or shirt or use a triangle bikini top easily (I can all the above) this weirdly compresses them and does nothing for them? It's like a bucket with a neck strap.High waist,  skirt starts flaring out kinda early,  not quite an empire waist but not a normal one either *though I am admittedly a little long waisted

This is such a beautiful dress! Got lots of compliments on my birthday. I ordered a size small (5'4, 130lbs, 34 chest, 26 waist, 38 hip). I really, really appreciate the ability to cinch using the "corset" straps in the back, as at first it was a little too big on me. I had to tighten it all the way, but luckily it had fit well! I would've loved to have seen a size xs available though to see if that would've been a better fit or not. But regardless, it still looked great. Good quality, and I love the hidden zipper as well. I will definitely be ordering more of this dress in different patterns.
